CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1957, pg. A9 reads: "Bermuda Ball - A gala Bermuda Ball will be held at the Fort Pitt Hotel, Friday, July 19, at which "Miss Bermuda" of 1957 will be selected. Advance tickets are on sale for $1.50 and $1.75 at the door.  Contestants are, front row, left to right: Betty Harris, Betty Givens, Barbara Stotts and Joan Clay.  Second row: Jacqueline Scott. Pearl Sturdivant, Zelma Glanton, Reta Diggs, Veronica Gloster and Pearline Gordon.  Contestants not in photo are Mary Harris, Betty Lou Finley, Janice Smith and Brenda McCallum. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Miss Bermuda" contestants, left to right, front row: Betty Harris, Betty Givens, Barbara Stotts and Joan Clay; second row: Jacqueline Scott, Pearl Sturdivant, Zelma Glanton, Reta Diggs, Veronica Gloster and Pearline Gordon, posed in front of a brick wall with window and light colored curtains
